item.title: Zumiez Inc 10-K
item.description: Zumiez Inc, which is in the Retail-Apparel & Accessory Stores [5600] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 14, 2022 had 22676 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: fiscal - 208 instances january - 206 instances million - 185 instances financial - 182 instances sales - 176 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
